meanings.sent1: After the race, he felt the effects of overexertion in his tired muscles.
meanings.sent2: Overexertion during the workout led to soreness the next day.
meanings.sent3: The overexertion required to lift the heavy box left him feeling like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her job often led to overexertion, but she never complained.
meanings.sent5: The overexertion of climbing the steep hill left him breathless and exhausted.

meanings.definition: The act of pushing oneself beyond one's physical limits.
meanings.sent1: His overexertion during the marathon resulted in a personal best time.
meanings.sent2: Overexertion in the gym can sometimes lead to injuries.
meanings.sent3: Attempting to carry all the groceries in one trip was an example of overexertion.
meanings.sent4: The overexertion of trying to finish the project in one day was evident in his tired eyes.
meanings.sent5: She knew she had reached the point of overexertion when she could barely stand.
